tool.name: DetectFractionChange

param.name: in_project_file
param.dialogReference: Every site has a unique meta.json file in its project folder. Find and select this file to set the current site containing the UAV image you want to asses fractional change for.

param.name: in_capture_datetime
param.dialogReference: Set the UAV image for which fractional cover images have been previously generated for, based on the date and time it was flown. If fractional cover images have not been generated yet, run the "Generate Fractions" tool first.

param.name: in_from_year
param.dialogReference: Set the "from" year to use for change detection analysis. The year that rehabilitation began at the site is the default. Use the manual option to set a specific "from" year.

param.name: in_to_year
param.dialogReference: Set the "to" year to use for change detection analysis. The current year is the default. If the current year does not have the requested month below yet, will roll back a year. Use the manual option to set a specific "to" year.

param.name: in_manual_to_year
param.dialogReference: Set the "to" year manually. Must be > the "from" year.

param.name: in_month
param.expression: Month of Rehabilitation | Month of First UAV Capture | Manual
param.dialogReference: Set the month to compare images on during change detection analysis. The default is the month rehabilitation commenced. Manually override the month using the manual option.

param.name: in_manual_month
param.dialogReference: Set a specific month for change detection.

param.name: in_z
param.dialogReference: Set the z-score threshold to use for separating change into "significant" and "insignificant". The z-score value represents standard deviation. For example, a z-score of 2 will highlight any native or weed change >2 standard deviations of the typical change values occurring on the imagery. The higher the z-score value, the more significant the change has to be in order to be returned on output. Must be between 1 and 3 (inclusive).

tool.summary: Perform a change detection between two fractional cover dates. Gains and losses for natives, weeds and other classes found between the two fraction image dates are obtained using a global Z-Score method to detect outliers.
